articles.author: Sara Whitman
articles.title: MGK Went ‘Ballistic’ Over A Suggestive Megan Fox Movie Scene, All-American Rejects’ Tyson Ritter Claims - HollywoodLife
articles.description: Tyson Ritter claimed MGK was 'fully unhinged' after he discussed a change in a scene with Megan Fox for their movie, 'Johnny & Clyde'.
articles.content:
View galleryImage Credit: (Photo: AXELLE/BAUER-GRIFFIN / MEGA)
Machine Gun Kelly doesnt like sharing his woman. Tyson Ritter, the frontman of the All-American Rejects and Megan Foxs co-star in 2023s… [+2640 chars]
